inclusion.criterion: Male or female, age greater than or equal to 18 years.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Either treatment na(SqrRoot) ve or experienced defined as failure of a prior course of interferon-based and ribavirin, DAA plus interferon and DAA only (except for NS5a failures).
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Confirmation of chronic HCV infection documented by either: A positive HCV RNA or positive HCV genotyping test at least 6 months prior to the Baseline/Day 1 visit, or A liver biopsy performed prior to screening visit showing evidence of chronic hepatitis.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subjects must have the following laboratory parameters at screening: ALT less than or equal to 10 (SqrRoot) the upper limit of normal (ULN)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: AST less than or equal 10 (SqrRoot) ULN
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Total bilirubin <2.5 mg/dL, Direct bilirubin less than or equal 1.5 ULN
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Platelets more than or equal 50,000 K/mm3
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: eGFR more than or equal 60 mL /min, as calculated by the CKD-EPI equation.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: INR less than or equal 1.5 unless subject has known hemophilia or is stable on an anticoagulant regimen affecting INR.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Pregnancy, active breast-feeding, or inability to practice adequate contraception, in women of childbearing potential. Adequate contraception is defined as vasectomy in men, tubal ligation in women, or use of one method such as condoms and spermicide combination, birth control pills, an intrauterine device, Depo-Provera, or Norplant until 12 weeks post therapy.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Current or prior history of any of the following: Clinically-significant illness (other than HCV) or any other major medical disorder that may interfere with subject treatment, assessment or compliance with the protocol; subjects currently under evaluation for a potentially clinically-significant illness (other than HCV) are also excluded.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Gastrointestinal disorder or post-operative condition that could interfere with the absorption of the study drug.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 53-year-old man with chronic HCV infection. He has been on IFN and RBV combination therapy for 9 months, with direct antiviral drugs added 6 months ago. His medical record shows previous positive HCV RNA tests and anti-HCV-antibodies. The recent biopsy was negative for hepatocellular carcinoma and showed chronic inflammation compatible with a chronic viral hepatitis.
